DOC.HEADLINE: PROTESTERS BOMBARD KKK RALLY IN ILLINOIS
DOC.TEXT: About 300 counterprotesters hurled rocks , batteries and obscenities at about 65 Ku Klux Klansmen who rallied Sunday to protest today ' s holiday in honor of slain civil_rights leader Dr. Martin_Luther_King Jr . About 65 klan members chanted " white power " while standing in heavy snow and subzero temperatures on the Capitol steps .
